name: Lasertron
description: Lasertron is a powerful oscilloscope-themed robot who is an esteemed member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant rossoCorsa colored box and a sleek laser screen, Lasertron is a force to be reckoned with. Equipped with soldier-like arms and legs, it stands tall and exudes an air of strength and resilience. Lasertron's advanced technology allows it to emit powerful laser beams, making it an invaluable asset to the club's endeavors.
